segments.text: Did you like the Chanel bag that I got ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must have a rich boyfriend because that bag is so expensive !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought it on eBay . It was only one-tenth of the original price . And the purchase was so easy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No kidding ! Then how do you know the bag's real ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it came with a certificate , and it looks real . But auctioning on eBay is risky .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A risk I would never take ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you haven't browsed eBay before ... get online . Don't hang up !
segments.speaker: S1
